price: ដូចេ្នះ ពួកគេគ្មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការតទល់(នឹងទារុណកម្ម) ឡើយ ហើយពួកគេក៏មិនអាចជួយខ្លួនឯងបានដែរ។
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
